channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish left by walkway, 11th October
item.description:
There is a lot of rubbish left on the footpath between Cambridge Barracks Road and Marine Drive. The rubbish covers the footpath and goes deep all the way back to the security fence

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchill Court, Charlton Riverside, London

item.title: Abandoned van in private parking, 11th October
item.description:
This vehicle was left in our parking area for a week now. Obstructing gates. Most lilely flying tipping commitment was done because after vehicle was left in area, bulk rubish appeard as well. Reported our household assosiation, but they do nothing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Homesdale Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Top end of Kenilworth Road outside Coronation Court, 11th October
item.description:
What is going on here folks???!!! This hot mess of fly tipping has been growing each day since last week. It started off with some cupboards, MSF boards ripped and has grown to include a fridge freezer, a sink and now general rubbish as people add to the mound. It is obviously coming from the court where renovations are taking place. It is now blocking the entire pavement and is a safety hazard. Someone could trip and really hurt themselves. What are you going to do about this as you have left this for several days now - it is looking apocalyptic.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Willesden Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load
